alert.note: Alert for Keith; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:43PM CDT until May 27 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT/700 PM MDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN KEITH AND NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 743 PM CDT/643 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Paxton, or 17 miles east of Ogallala, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sutherland, Paxton, Keystone, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, Sarben, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Coker, Nevens and Broganville. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 94 and 98. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 131 and 158. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
